Email 1: Introduction

Dear [Name],

We hope this email finds you well. As you know, safety is of the utmost importance in the workplace. That's why we're excited to offer you the opportunity to upgrade your train the trainer status to our Safety Club membership.

For just $11 per employee per month, you'll have access to exclusive Manager and Supervisor trainings, as well as OSHA top 10 violations certification courses for your employees. This will ensure that your company stays in compliance with OSHA regulations and maintains a culture of safety.

Email 2: Benefits of Safety Club Membership

Dear [Name],

We wanted to follow up on our previous email and highlight some of the benefits of our Safety Club membership.

As a member, you'll have access to ongoing support, resources, and training to keep your safety program up-to-date and your employees informed on the latest safety regulations and best practices. Additionally, you'll have access to our team of OSHA-authorized safety experts who will be available to answer any questions you may have.

By upgrading to our Safety Club membership, you'll be able to protect your employees, maintain a culture of safety, and ensure your company's safety reputation.

Email 3: Manager and Supervisor Trainings

Dear [Name],

We wanted to give you more information on the Manager and Supervisor trainings that come with our Safety Club membership.

These trainings will provide your managers and supervisors with the knowledge and skills they need to effectively lead your safety program and ensure that your company stays in compliance with OSHA regulations. They will learn about the latest safety regulations, best practices, and how to create a culture of safety within your company.

By investing in these trainings, you'll be able to ensure that your managers and supervisors are equipped to lead your safety program and keep your employees safe.
